data.md:MetaData: Meteorological observations during ALBATROSS cruise from Spithead to Mocha started at 1798-06-29
Ship: Albatross (Brig), Voyage: Spithead - Mocha, 1st Observer: Charles Adams (Captain), Company: Royal Navy, Other ship information: 16G, 365BM
CLIWOC: A Climatological Database for the World's Oceans 1750–1854 (and 10 more publications about CLIWOC results in the same volume)
